    • Method Detail

      • getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifestFile

        public static ArchiveMetaInformation getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifestFile​(File file,
                                                                               ILFLog log)
                                                                        throws IOException
        Tries to obtains meta information for a MANIFEST.MF that is available as a file.

        The method tries to extract the following information from the manifest:

        • a version number, extracted from the main attributes "Bundle-Version", "Implementation-Version", "Specification-Version" or "Major-Version"
        • a license URL, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-License"
        • a vendor name, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-Vendor"

        This method is intended for unpacked JARs.

        Parameters:
        file - a manifest file
        log - a logger
        Returns:
        an object containing version, license URL and vendor name. The information in the object may be null. The object itself is never null.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest(File, ILFLog), getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest(InputStream, ILFLog)

      • getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest

        public static ArchiveMetaInformation getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest​(File file,
                                                                           ILFLog log)
                                                                    throws IOException
        Tries to obtains meta information for a JAR from its MANIFEST.MF.

        The method tries to extract the following information from the manifest:

        • a version number, extracted from the main attributes "Bundle-Version", "Implementation-Version", "Specification-Version" or "Major-Version"
        • a license URL, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-License"
        • a vendor name, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-Vendor"

        This method is intended for packed JARs available as file, i.e. as part of an unpacked JAR.

        Parameters:
        file - a JAR file
        log - a logger
        Returns:
        an object containing version, license URL and vendor name. The information in the object may be null. The object itself is never null.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifestFile(File, ILFLog), getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest(InputStream, ILFLog)

      • getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest

        public static ArchiveMetaInformation getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest​(InputStream inputStream,
                                                                           ILFLog log)
                                                                    throws IOException
        Tries to obtains meta information for a JAR from its MANIFEST.MF.

        The method tries to extract the following information from the manifest:

        • a version number, extracted from the main attributes "Bundle-Version", "Implementation-Version", "Specification-Version" or "Major-Version"
        • a license URL, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-License"
        • a vendor name, extracted from the main attribute "Bundle-Vendor"

        This method is intended for packed JARs available from inside another packed JAR.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - a JAR file
        log - a logger
        Returns:
        an object containing version, license URL and vendor name. The information in the object may be null. The object itself is never null.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifestFile(File, ILFLog), getArchiveMetaInformationFromManifest(File, ILFLog)
